title: Bug 17825ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Build F1 (20020521)Win2K(I'm not sure if this is SWT or just the SWT Example)In the SWT example ControlExample, under the Text tab, click on StylesSWT.SINGLE and then back on StylesSWT.MULTI. I hear a windows 'ding' when Ido this (the bell sound that means you did something wrong). Then clicking onother buttons also makes the bell sound. Somehow I don't think it's supposed todo that.
